mapper.insert: INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_R_H ( OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID, REL_OBJ_ID, HST_SEQ, HST_CRET_DT, HST_CRETR_ID, REQ_SEQ, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, REL_TYPE_ID, OBJ_REL_ANALS_CD ) SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.REL_OBJ_ID , #{HST_SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{sessionInfo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{REQ_SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , T101.DEL_YN , T101.CRET_DT , T101.CRETR_ID , T101.CHG_DT , T101.CHGR_ID , T101.REL_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_REL_ANALS_CD FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_R T101 WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{relObjTypeId} AND T101.REL_OBJ_ID = #{relObjId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N'

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_R_H ( OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID, REL_OBJ_ID, HST_SEQ, HST_CRET_DT, HST_CRETR_ID, REQ_SEQ, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, REL_TYPE_ID, OBJ_REL_ANALS_CD ) SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.REL_OBJ_ID , #{HST_SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{sessionInfo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{REQ_SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , T101.DEL_YN , T101.CRET_DT , T101.CRETR_ID , T101.CHG_DT , T101.CHGR_ID , T101.REL_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_REL_ANALS_CD FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_R T101 WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ( (T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.OBJ_ID = #{objId}) OR (T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.REL_OBJ_ID = #{objId}) )
